location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J Stewart, Deputy Assistant Commissary General, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a contract with Arratoon Constantine for 150 horses to be supplied to Bombay. It requests that the Resident ensures that the ship these horses are transported aboard is protected by one of the East India Company's cruizers.
